structure.unit: Chapter 8AA CABLE AND COMMUNICATIONS SERVICES PROVIDERS

text.section:
Sec. 8AA-47. Emergency alert capability.
Licensee's cable system shall include an "emergency alert" capability, which shall permit the County Manager or designated representative, to the extent permitted by applicable law, to remotely override the audio of all channels on the cable system or to allow for video crawl over all channels without charge for use during emergency or disaster periods.
